title: Librarian
description:
Librarian is a module that provides a "Handout Sheet," which is a variant of the Loot Sheet that presents to non-GMs as a handout, showing either the identified or unidentified text.

It will be designed so that the handout background can be swapped out, and things like aspect ratio, scaling, hue shifting, and size fixedness can be controlled by the GM in a configuration dialog.
